title: Why is this shit happening to me? stuck on the league of legends logo after champion select.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/hZcKz4L.png
Every time stuck on the league of legends logo after champion select. and i reconnect for 17 minute, keep telling me it crashed?  what the shit? this shit is happening when the S6 world championship start. why ?
http://i.imgur.com/lI9N29U.png
I did reinstall but still. 
http://i.imgur.com/VUfpg2v.png
make me afk for 17 minute

http://i.imgur.com/IAXCK1U.png
Internet no problem

处理器	英特尔 Core i5-4570 @ 3.20GHz 四核

光驱	东芝-三星 CDDVDW SH-224DB DVD刻录机
声卡	瑞昱 ALC887 @ 英特尔 Lynx Point  高保真音频
网卡	瑞昱 RTL8168/8111/8112 Gigabit Ethernet Controller / 技嘉

SOME ONE HELP ME PLEASE, IS IT ONLY ME OR SOME PEOPLE HAVE THIS SHIT TOO? ?? ? ? ? ? ?{{champion:103}}

replies.body:
SOME ONE HELP ME PLEASE
IM THE ONLY ONE HAVE THIS SHIT OR EVERYBODY SAME???????????{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

have you changed screen res or monitor?? sounds like a problem i had trying to play it on a HD tv, the config files got stuck at different res,  delete the screen size line in the config file. restart the game. you can remove the config file to test , it makes a new default one ,  if its not the config in c drive riot folder, its in my doc folder, it has all the user game setting,  something like that,

Have you tried opening the client again? 

Some guy also posted on the NA Board : "I FOUND THE PROBLEM, for me atleast, i had lolreplay running in the back ground, so i closed that and tried again and it worked just fine
seems to have worked for allot of other people too, try that and see if it works!"

If that does doesn't work then maybe you have to replace some files by downloading the original download and replacing some of your client content with the original ( I used it for mac when the client doesn't work I replace some of the files with the original and it works perfectly fine)

If this problem have to do with your fire wall then another guy also made a post in consideration of your firewall
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sLP5EAKb-i-fixed-the-firewall-issue-everyone-please-look

Last resort would be uninstalling the whole thing, but as you said that you re-installed and it resulted it in not working then try removing every league file and re-install. (Last time I played league on windows, I uninstalled the whole thing waited a few days and installed the game again and it worked, not sure how it worked but it did) 

But then again, Im just another summoner like you, if you still need help then I'll do my best to look around and help you out by posting links to post that will help you fix your client bug. 

Also make sure to send in a support ticket if you haven't already and remember more detail about what happen then the better the chances riot will give you a solution.

And fyi, there was apparently majority of players (maybe 900+) who suffered the same.
